steps.sql: SELECT id FROM materials WHERE name = 'Leather';
steps.description: Retrieve the material ID for the material with the name "Leather"

steps.sql: SELECT cutting_task_id FROM cutting_material_allocation WHERE warehouse_material_id IN (SELECT id FROM warehouse_material WHERE material_id = '7');
steps.description: Retrieve the cutting task IDs that use the material "Leather"

steps.sql: SELECT ct.id, ct.start_time, ct.end_time, wg.name AS working_group_name, op.id AS order_product_id FROM cutting_tasks ct JOIN working_group wg ON ct.working_group_id = wg.id JOIN order_product op ON ct.order_product_id = op.id WHERE ct.id IN (15, 16, 17, 18, 20, 25, 27, 32);
steps.description: Retrieve the details of cutting tasks that use the material "Leather"

response:
